sentences.sContent: Renowned hi-tech company Huawei is encouraging its staff to headhunt for the company as a sideline, offering a RMB500 bonus for any employee who can recruit qualified personnel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Renowned hi-tech company Huawei is encouraging its staff to headhunt for the company as a sideline, offering a RMB500 bonus for any employee who can recruit qualified personnel.
sentences.sCn: 知名企业深圳华为正鼓励员工兼职当公司的猎头，凡是能为公司挖来合格人才的员工，都可以得到500元奖金。

trans.tranCn: 野蛮人猎取人头的出征
